questions.question: In speech recognition, has there been much success in being able to create adversarial examples that fool the system?
And what function do you use to make a prediction given the data and the parameters?
Do you think there's still many such groundbreaking ideas in deep learning that could be developed so quickly?
What would Ian Goodfellow sit back and be really damn impressed if a system was able to accomplish?
If you have to prove to the world that you are indeed human, how would you do it?
